On Thu, Aug 4, 2011 at 7:41 PM, Jakob Strauch <jakob.strauch@...> wrote:

>
> > Intermediaries ARE clients, just not YOUR client. Who knows what they're
> > doing. Your server can't tell the difference.
>
> I know, but what if I care less about intermediaries (think about securing
> representations - e.g. by https - it will eliminate intermediate caching
> efforts).
>
> I think there is much more (business) value in concentrating on things like
> hypermedia, integration and interoperability (serendipitous use).
>

How would creating an additional media type for html forms help with any of
that?

Cheers,
Mike

>
>

--000e0cd32ede148ee704a9b438b7
